description:
A sweet little harness for junior senders. It's fully adjustable, so it can be used by kids of different sizes and ages. Two webbing sections absorb pressure on the hip belt equally and distribute it over a wide area. Perforated foam and mesh fabrics add breathability and hot-weather comfort.

  • 2-part webbing construction distributes weight and pressure
  • Reinforced, self-locking buckles on the waist and legs are safe and ease of use
  • Lower tie-in point has protector to prevent abrasion and add good safety margins
  • Drop seat with adjustable leg loops adapts to fit as kids grow
name: Mammut Ophir Harness - Children to Youths
